original_prompt.prompt: Create a compelling product description for a new eco-friendly water bottle. Highlight its sustainable features and unique selling points.

clarity.description: The original prompt is clear in its request for a product description focusing on sustainability and unique selling points. However, it lacks specific details about the target audience, the nature of the sustainable features, and how the description should appeal to the reader.
suggestions: Specify the target audience for the product.
Detail the sustainable features more explicitly.
Clarify the tone or style of the description.
Specify the target audience for the product.
Detail the sustainable features more explicitly.
Clarify the tone or style of the description.

enhanced_prompt.prompt: Create a compelling product description for a new eco-friendly water bottle aimed at environmentally conscious consumers. Highlight its sustainable features, such as being made from 100% recycled materials, BPA-free, and produced using renewable energy. Emphasize unique selling points like its innovative design, durability, and contribution to reducing plastic waste. The description should be professional yet engaging, appealing to consumers who prioritize sustainability in their purchasing decisions.

clarity.description: The enhanced prompt significantly improves upon the original by specifying the target audience (environmentally conscious consumers), detailing the sustainable features (100% recycled materials, BPA-free, renewable energy production), and outlining the unique selling points (innovative design, durability, contribution to reducing plastic waste). It also specifies the desired tone (professional yet engaging) and the appeal to sustainability priorities.
suggestions: Consider adding a call to action to further engage potential customers.
Mention any certifications or awards the product has received to bolster credibility.
Consider adding a call to action to further engage potential customers.
Mention any certifications or awards the product has received to bolster credibility.
